md:
giải nghĩa từ "finalizing" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Finalizing (verb) - Hoàn thành, kết thúc

* Meaning: to complete or conclude something, especially a project or a task.
* Example sentence: "The team is finalizing the report and will submit it to the manager by the end of the day."
* Related words: complete, conclude, finish, terminate.

Finalizing (verb) - Đưa ra quyết định cuối cùng

* Meaning: to make a final decision or judgment about something.
* Example sentence: "The jury is finalizing their verdict and will announce it to the court soon."
* Related words: decide, determine, settle, conclude.

Finalizing (verb) - Hoàn thiện, hoàn chỉnh

* Meaning: to make something perfect or complete by adding the final details or touches.
* Example sentence: "The artist is finalizing the painting by adding the last brushstrokes."
* Related words: perfect, complete, refine, polish.

Note: The meaning of "finalizing" can vary depending on the context in which it is used. The above examples illustrate three different meanings of the word.
